data.title: MaNgA, mUsIc AnD aNiMe (Ad perpetuum/everlasting)

data.text:
wow this movie was just WOW i’m so happy i randomly found the trailer on youtube BEST RANDOM CLICK EVER !!! the art is beautiful and the story amazing!!! i wonder what i would do if i woke up to a new world and had a chance to change it back…. if it was a world like that then i just might not consider it cuz that forest was amazing i mean who do not want plants that turns into FREAKING AMAZING DRAGONS ! (ok ok might be a bad idea but still !) and another things i love is the music *O* so epic ! KOKIA sure is an amazing singer !

perhaps one thing that i dont like is that sometimes things ( for me) felt a bit rushed in the story but that might be just me. like the part when he went into the forest BOOM got the power and BOOM is running after the girl.

Genres: adventure, drama, romance, science fiction

Summary:

A boy named Agito stumbles upon a machine which has been keeping a girl named Toola in suspended animation for 300 years. Toola awakens to discover that the earth’s environment has been radically altered due to genetic experiments that her father was involved in, and that the forest itself has become a sentient entity. Together with Shunack, another person from the past, Toola attempts to use long dormant technology to return things to the way they used to be. When Toola comes to the realization that the ways of the past should not be revived, she and Agito fight to protect the world as it has become, and try to create a balance between mankind and nature.

Opening Theme:

“Chouwa oto ~with reflection~” by KOKIA

Ending Theme:

“Ai no Melody” by KOKIA
